column1: 1594315443786944513,1594315443786944513My friend/adopted daughter got her citizenship yesterday! Waited 5 years, worked hard, got her Associate’s Degree & is working toward Bachelor’s Degree! All, while bringing up her fab son! She’s the kind of immigrant we cherish…and…she’s voting Republican!
